quote: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
author: Ovid

quote: Rest and be thankful.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Even the best of us need rest to be our best.
author: Anonymous

quote: The antidote to exhaustion isn’t rest. It’s wholeheartedness.
author: David Whyte

quote: Sometimes, the most productive thing you can do is relax.
author: Mark Black

quote: Resting is not laziness, it’s medicine.
author: Glenn Schweitzer

quote: Nothing ever fatigues me, but doing what I do not like.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I’m gettin’ tired way past where sleep rests me.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: But when weariness finally forced him to be silent, he was no longer of use to his tormentors, and they sought amusement elsewhere.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I’m just tired of everything... even of the echoes.
author: L. M. Montgomery

quote: Others are as tired of themselves as you are. Let each one learn to bore himself.
author: James Joyce

quote: You never get tired unless you stop and take time for it.
author: Bob Hope

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
author: Mark Black

quote: Rest is not idleness, and to lie sometimes on the grass under trees on a summer day, listening to the murmur of water, or watching the clouds float across the sky, is by no means a waste of time.
author: John Lubbock

quote: Fatigue is the best pillow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The best cure for weariness is worry; worry will keep you awake all night!
author: Unknown

quote: You cannot pour from an empty cup; take care of yourself first.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes you just need a break from everyone and everything.
author: Unknown

quote: Tired minds don’t plan well; sleep first, plan later.
author: Walter Reisch

quote: It’s okay to rest; you don’t have to do it all at once.
author: Unknown

quote: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor’s book.
author: Irish Proverb

quote: I'm just really tired of being tired.
author: Unknown

quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: Taking time to rest is not a luxury; it’s a necessity.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Exhaustion is not a badge of honor.
author: Unknown

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Sometimes you need to take a break from everyone and spend time alone.
author: Unknown

quote: Rest allows us time for reflection.
author: Unknown

quote: Tiredness often leads us back home…to ourselves.
author: Unknown

quote: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Being tired isn’t weakness; it's just part of being human.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is rest.
author: Unknown

quote: Sleep brings clarity when everything feels overwhelming.
author: Unknown

quote: When you're feeling overwhelmed, remember that it's okay to rest.
author: Unknown

quote: To be able to sleep well at night, we must not be in conflict with ourselves.
author: Unknown

quote: If you're too busy to take care of yourself, you're too busy.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes all we need is a break from everything!
author: Unknown

quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Don’t let exhaustion steal your joy.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to recharge your batteries is through rest and relaxation.
author: Unknown

quote: A good night’s sleep can change everything.
author: Unknown
